title: ITC Hotels witnessing growing interest among property owners to partner with its brand : ITC Annual Report
description: ITC Hotels' strategic expansion across diverse segments led to significant revenue growth, surpassing Rs 1000 crore in Segment EBITDA and witnessing a remarkable 39% increase in Segment PBIT.
